resources.string: Are you sure you want to start a new game? You\'ll lose your current progress.
Congratulations, you won! Do you want to start a new game?

Sliding Puzzle

Your goal is to place the pieces in the correct order, so the empty space is in the bottom-right corner and the tiles are in order from 1-15 (from left to right and top to bottom)
